"Mind Over Miles": A half marathon themed escape room challenge where participants must solve puzzles and clues to reach the finish line.
"Virtual Reality Marathon": A virtual reality experience that simulates the entire half marathon course, complete with realistic terrain, weather conditions, and obstacles.
"Sonic Scavenger Hunt": A half marathon themed scavenger hunt where participants must collect and deposit items at various checkpoints along the course.
"Fitness Frenzy": A half marathon themed video game challenge where participants must complete various fitness-related challenges to progress through levels.
"Charity Challenge": A half marathon themed fundraising challenge where participants must raise a certain amount of money for a designated charity in exchange for a spot in the race.
